mapper.insert: insert into log(admin_id, ip, type, action, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified, action_id) values (#{adminId}, #{ip}, #{type}, #{action}, #{statusCode}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{actionId})
mapper.select: select id, admin_id, ip, type, action, status as status_code, gmt_create, gmt_modified, action_id from log where id = #{id}
